sentence.Network_en: He was accused of spying and was declared non grata.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被指控从事间谍活动而被宣布为不受欢迎.

sentence.Network_en: The government has declared the French ambassador persona non grata and ordered him to leave the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府已经宣布法国大使为不受欢迎的人，勒令其离境。

sentence.Network_en: Several dissidents are considered ( as ) persona non grata by a certain government.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些异议分子不受某一政府的欢迎.

PerfectNetExp.abs: We decided to declare them personae non grata ., 我们决定宣布他们为不受欢迎的人.
grat 格拉, grata 格拉塔, grat 齿轮比

list.abs: ...长流苏龙胆（学名：Gentiana grata）为龙胆科龙胆属的植物。分布于缅甸以及中国大陆的云南、西藏等地，生长于海拔2,900米至4,050米的地区，常生于山坡草地以及高山沼泽草地，目前尚未由人工引种栽培。== 参考文献 ==<div class=“references-.
